channel.title: BrokenX - the new epic server
channel.description:
hello mopar,
i finally just created my server now :D
[b]..::Features::..
-602 Anims/Gfx/ -Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours -Tormented Demons -All skills working except Summoning and Hunter. -Almost every special works. -Good/Decent Economy if ran as is. -Pking/PvP. -Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects -alot of good items added. -All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works. -Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount. -2 Donator Shops. One is a Barrows Shop, the other is a Rare Shop (not Party Hats and H'Weens). -Custom Quest Tab. -Lock EXP Tab. -PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them. -Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, GWD, etc. -Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena Etc). -Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching/Zoom -RFD Quest Shop -Working ::maxhit command. -Much More- [/b]
here's some pics:
[img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/SlayerShop.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PkShop.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorShop.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PCStore.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donatorzone.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorOptions.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/x10.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/warriorsguild.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/DagKings.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/godwars.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Jad.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Home.png[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/curses.png[/img]
hope u enjoy ;)
server website: [url=http://www.brokennx.webs.com]CLICKHERE[/url] server download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?kfplhhp92r444wc]http://www.mediafire.com/?kfplhhp92r444wc[/url]

item.title: BrokenX - the new epic server
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:5, topic:465918”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=573064.msg4140012#msg4140012 date=1352053696]

why would you leech this shitty source Its like insidiax With nothing added!
Oh wait this is a dspk So its worst
this has nothing edited so its basicly a full blown leech you did nothing to it.
Good job Your leeching level is now 99.
[/quote]I really do have to agree with this but at any rate who knows maybe he will learn something

i don’t think you should be hosting while learning not a good combination in my mind[/quote]Not true,

I consider myself at least a decent programmer (I am no expert though )

I host my own server, and still learn new things occasionally. Mainly better practices

Read full topic

item.title: BrokenX - the new epic server
item.dc:creator: @ghassen ghassen
item.description:
@ghassen wrote:

hello mopar,

i finally just created my server now

[b]…::Features::…

-602 Anims/Gfx/
-Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours
-Tormented Demons
-All skills working except Summoning and Hunter.
-Almost every special works.
-Good/Decent Economy if ran as is.
-Pking/PvP.
-Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects
-alot of good items added.
-All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works.
-Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount.
-2 Donator Shops. One is a Barrows Shop, the other is a Rare Shop (not Party Hats and H’Weens).
-Custom Quest Tab.
-Lock EXP Tab.
-PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them.
-Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, GWD, etc.
-Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena Etc).
-Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching/Zoom
-RFD Quest Shop
-Working ::maxhit command.
-Much More-
[/b]

here’s some pics:














hope u enjoy
